mapper.sql: id, ip, port, datacenter, jcxm, instruct, data_result, data_original, create_time, bz, sm1, sm2, sm3, sm4

select
distinct
from water_quality_result
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into water_quality_result (id, ip, port, datacenter, jcxm, instruct, data_result, data_original, create_time, bz, sm1, sm2, sm3, sm4) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{datacenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instruct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataOriginal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sm4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update water_quality_result set ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, datacenter = #{datacenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jcxm = #{jcxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instruct = #{instruct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_result = #{dataResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_original = #{dataOriginal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm1 = #{sm1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm2 = #{sm2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm3 = #{sm3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sm4 = #{sm4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.* FROM water_quality_result a,( SELECT ip,jcxm , MAX(create_time) AS create_time FROM water_quality_result
and TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY ip ,jcxm ) b WHERE a.ip = b.ip AND a.create_time = b.create_time AND a.jcxm = b.jcxm ORDER BY a.ip ,a.jcxm

SELECT sm1 `key` ,COUNT(*) `value` FROM water_quality_result
and TO_DAYS(create_time) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) GROUP BY sm1

select ip,datacenter,jcxm,SUM(data_result) sumDataResult,COUNT(*) count from water_quality_result
GROUP BY ip,datacenter,jcxm
